value.description: Allows the building of the basic manager desk, an essential part of any organized colony.

Learn to create reinforced concrete slabs at a fueled smelter. Known for it's strength and durability, concrete is an ancient construction material that has been used by humans for thousands of years.
The codex is a type of early hand-written book that replaced scrolls as the preferred medium of writing in the Middle Ages due to it's inclusion of a protective cover for the delicate manuscript.
Learn to create reinforced concrete bricks at a fueled smelter.

ThingDef.label: fridge vending machine
ThingDef.description: A vending machine to sell perishable food to guests.

value.description: A lightweight truss structure with flooring on top that forms the deck of a gravship. Only things on top of this substructure can be lifted by the grav engine's levitation field.

A lightweight truss structure with flooring on top that forms the deck of a gravship. Only things on top of this substructure can be lifted by the grav engine's levitation field.\n\nThis substructure is constructed out of transparent composites that allows for an unobstructed view. Not recommended for those with a fear of heights.

mods.li: Gene Forge - Make Genepacks with slurry
